item.title: Doi Chang Dao
item.description: Nov 22, 2016 Doi Chiang Dao - 3rd highest peak in Thailand Trip Log: 645am - leave bungalow 710am - start hike from the trailhead 1115am - summit 1210pm - start descent 410 pm - complete 630pm - culinary excursion to Chiang Dao Nest Camp sites below the mountain The goal Steep and narrow scramble to the top Need a green shirt to match the landscape Northern Thailand mountains Stopping to enjoy the view Exercising caution on the descent A beautiful lady takes a break on top of the mountain.
